abstract: Indian authorities announce killing of fifth gunman in ongoing standoff at Indian Air Force base near Pakistan border.

headline.print_headline: Indian Forces Kill 5th Gunman in Battle at Air Base
headline.main: Indian Forces Kill 5th Gunman in Battle at Pathankot Air Base

snippet: The fighting stretched into a third day at the base near the Indian-Pakistan border, which was infiltrated Saturday by at least six attackers described as a “well-trained suicidal squad.”
lead_paragraph: The fighting stretched into a third day at the base near the Indian-Pakistan border, which was infiltrated Saturday by at least six attackers described as a “well-trained suicidal squad.”
